content: crochet these adorable teddy bears with absolutely **zero seaming** make them in a variety of colors and attach them to keychains so you can bring these bears wherever you go special techniques are used so that you do not need to use a yarn needle to attach or sew any parts together at all the samples in the pictures are crocheted using 24/7 cotton chenille appeal yarn and go for fleece sherpa yarn you can substitute yarns of various thicknesses and textures to get teddy bears of all different sizes the free crochet pattern can be found ** **here** 1 ** 1 https //www allaboutami com/no-sew-baby-bear/
